Articles.Content:
Does anyone know where I can get a list of key functions? I tried finding something but I am having no luck.

Edited April 27, 2015 by Bundyfly

Aww, the KSP wiki is down too... wait. That's a good thing, being updated to 1.0.

Here's something to help you, though.

https://sites.google.com/site/kspguideforbegginers123/key-bindings
No problem, I wish I had one of these things when I started.
I have learned a lot through trial and error......so much error

Kerbal-Proof is a good resource for when the wiki is down.

It has several graphical keyboard maps in the "Cheat Sheets" section.

Did you know that if you switch to docking mode and hit spacebar twice, it gives you a type of "hold" mode?

When you hold the spacebar, it switches to rotation mode (or translation, not sure) and when you let go, it reverts.

I didn't until the game lagged out and I hit it one too many times.

The more you know....

And, if you hold shift on a ladder, then hit a directional key, your Kerbal jumps off in that direction?

I mean really...

And, if you hold shift on a ladder, then hit a directional key, your Kerbal jumps off in that direction?

Wait... What?... How did I not know that? Going to have to take a look at the key list myself now!

Have some rep +1
